      Do Not be Silent about Genocide

      "Rebuilding Hope": initiative to support and resume higher education in Gaza
      Call for papers, “Engineering Destruction: Militarization and the War Economy” Conference
      The World Sides with GAZA
      Scroll for more

      STUDY AT BIRZEIT

      Founded in 1972, Birzeit University is a leading educational institution and an intellectual hub that attracts top students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities

      Bachelor's Programs

      Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health
      Master's Programs

      More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law
      Ph.D. Programs

      The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology that provide students the opportunity to break new scientific grounds and carry out world-class research
      Continuing Education

      Professional diplomas and executive education promoting excellence and lifelong learning
      International Students

      Information for international students on exchange programs, registration procedures, and study options, including the Palestine and Arabic Studies Program
      Admission & Registration

      Admission requirements, application processes, key dates, and academic regulations. Welcome to BZU!

      News

      Birzeit University Awards Honorary Doctorate in Humanities to Kuwaiti Businessman Kutayba Alghanim in Recognition of His Exceptional Contributions to Humanity and Education

      27 May

      “Palestine, Our Warm Home” Exhibition Presents International Collaboration in Poster Design for Creative Resistance

      22 May

      Dr. Abaher El Sakka Participates in the Seventh Conference on Social Sciences: “Destruction, Imagination, and Knowledge”

      21 May

      Birzeit University’s Faculty of Law and Public Administration Signs Memorandum of Understanding with Universidad Autónoma de Madrid to Strengthen Academic and Research Cooperation

      17 May

      Birzeit University Hosts the Fourth Annual Conference of the Palestinian Students Scholarship Fund (PSSF): Innovation and Student Support Amid Ongoing Challenges

      08 May

      Birzeit University Hosts Preparatory Meeting for the Annual Conference of the Palestinian Students Scholarship Fund (PSSF), with Wide Participation from Higher Education Institutions

      07 May

      Birzeit University Tops Palestinian Universities in 2025 UniRank

      06 May

      Birzeit University Launches International Conference: “The Palestinians and the Genocidal War on Gaza”

      05 May

      Master’s Student Dana Hasan and Dr. Amal Nazzal Publish an Academic Research Paper

      30 Apr

## STUDY AT BIRZEIT
Founded in 1972, Birzeit University is a leading educational institution and an intellectual hub that attracts top students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/005_1.jpg?itok=Lbv1MYlC)Bachelor's Programs Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/study/programs)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/004_3.jpg?itok=FnjHlZP8)Master's Programs More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions/masters-degree/masters-programs)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/006_3.jpg?itok=wN9yy8YT)Ph.D. Programs  The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology that provide students the opportunity to break new scientific grounds and carry out world-class research ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions/PhD)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/001_12.jpg?itok=JdJh3xhr)Continuing Education Professional diplomas and executive education promoting excellence and lifelong learning ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/study/professional-diploma)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/_eya7142-copy.jpg?itok=HAvGqmI5)International Students Information for international students on exchange programs, registration procedures, and study options, including the Palestine and Arabic Studies Program ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/international-students)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/003_3.jpg?itok=KT4YQeAS)Admission & Registration Admission requirements, application processes, key dates, and academic regulations. Welcome to BZU! ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions)

      STUDY AT BIRZEIT

      Founded in 1972, Birzeit University is a leading educational institution and an intellectual hub that attracts top students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities

      Bachelor's Programs

      Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health
      Master's Programs

      More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law
      Ph.D. Programs

      The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology that provide students the opportunity to break new scientific grounds and carry out world-class research
      Continuing Education

      Professional diplomas and executive education promoting excellence and lifelong learning
      International Students

      Information for international students on exchange programs, registration procedures, and study options, including the Palestine and Arabic Studies Program

STUDY AT BIRZEIT

Founded in 1972, Birzeit University is a leading educational institution and an intellectual hub that attracts top students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities

Bachelor's Programs

Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health
Master's Programs

More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law
Ph.D. Programs

The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology that provide students the opportunity to break new scientific grounds and carry out world-class research
Continuing Education

Professional diplomas and executive education promoting excellence and lifelong learning

Admission & Registration

## STUDY AT BIRZEIT
Founded in 1972, Birzeit University is a leading educational institution and an intellectual hub that attracts top students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/005_1.jpg?itok=Lbv1MYlC)Bachelor's Programs Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/study/programs)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/004_3.jpg?itok=FnjHlZP8)Master's Programs More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions/masters-degree/masters-programs)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/006_3.jpg?itok=wN9yy8YT)Ph.D. Programs  The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology that provide students the opportunity to break new scientific grounds and carry out world-class research ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions/PhD)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/001_12.jpg?itok=JdJh3xhr)Continuing Education Professional diplomas and executive education promoting excellence and lifelong learning ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/study/professional-diploma)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/_eya7142-copy.jpg?itok=HAvGqmI5)International Students Information for international students on exchange programs, registration procedures, and study options, including the Palestine and Arabic Studies Program ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/international-students)
[![](https://www.birzeit.edu/sites/default/files/styles/fp_items/public/003_3.jpg?itok=KT4YQeAS)Admission & Registration Admission requirements, application processes, key dates, and academic regulations. Welcome to BZU! ](https://www.birzeit.edu/en/admissions)

students and faculty, offering a wide range of academic programs and professional development opportunities Bachelor's Programs Over 83 programs in social sciences, education, governance, business, economics, science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and health Master's Programs More than 45 pure and interdisciplinary programs in various fields such as chemistry, engineering, economics, history, education, and law Ph.D. Programs The university offers 5 Ph.D. programs in Social Sciences, Computer Science, Mathmatics and Educational Development and Energy and Environment Technology
